alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 2:01AM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s expected. * WHERE...Cave Creek/New River and Fountain Hills/East Mesa. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Monday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa
